remarks: An edge of an undirected simple graph without loops is a proper unordered pair of vertices.  (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2020.)
statement:
edgprvtx $p |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ E e. ( Edges ` G ) ) -> E. x e. ( 1st ` G ) E. y e. ( 1st ` G ) ( x =/= y /\ E = { x , y } ) ) $.
$d E x y $.
$d G x y $.
